title: Plus One Month Free! Wonderful Closet Space! Newly Renovated!
posting_body: ['Welcome Home to Canyon Drive Manor!Our beautiful Hollywood community offers studios, one and two bedroom apartments.', 'Interior amenities include new vinyl planking, stove, dishwasher, air conditioner, ceramic tile in kitchen and bathroom.', 'Community benefits include laundry facility, control access entry, refreshing pool, relaxing barbecue area, sauna, fitness center, and subterranean parking.', 'Canyon Drive Manor is conveniently located in Franklin Village and near Gelsons, Rite Aid, 24 hour fitness and CVS with excellent freeway access to 101 freeway and moments away from the MTA.', 'Canyon Drive Manor Apartments has everything you are looking for and it is right in the glamour of it all!', 'Contact our friendly and professional leasing team and find your new home at Canyon Drive Manor Apartments in Hollywood!', 'Professionally Managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc., CA - License # 01834798', '-BBQ/Picnic Area', '-Electric Stove', '-View', '-Controlled Access/Gated', '-Ceiling Fan', '-On-Site Management', '-Covered Parking', '-Clubhouse', '-Fitness Center', '-Vinyl', 'Planking', '-Dishwasher', '-Night Patrol', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Our beautiful Hollywood community offers studios, one- and two-bedroom apartments.', 'Interior amenities include vinyl planking, stove, dishwasher, air conditioner, ceramic tile in kitchen and bathroom.', 'Community features include laundry facility, control access entry, refreshing pool, relaxing barbecue area, fitness center, and subterranean parking.', 'Canyon Drive Manor is conveniently located in Franklin Village.', 'Minutes from Gelsons, Rite Aid, 24-hour fitness and Hollywood attractions, with excellent freeway access to 101 and 5 freeways, and moments away from the MTA.', 'Canyon Drive Manor Apartments has everything you are looking for and it is right in the glamour of it all!', 'Contact our friendly and professional leasing team and find your new home at Canyon Drive Manor Apartments in Hollywood!', 'Professionally Managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc.', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', '-Laundry Facility', '-Online Service Requests', '-Window Coverings', '-Patio/Balcony', '-Microwave', '-Refrigerator', '-Disposal', '-Dishwasher', '-Cable Ready', '-Air Conditioner', '-Carpeting', '-Ceiling Fan', '*Advertised rental rates Include Temporary Monthly Discount*', '*Pricing and availability changes daily.', 'Price reflects discount offered.', 'Cities:\xa0 West Hollywood, Miracle Mile, Hollywood, Mid-Wilshire, Echo Park, Los Feliz']
